original_text: Jesus let them do this. So the bad spirits came out of the man and they went into the pigs. There were about 2,000 pigs. They rushed together down the hill into the lake. All the pigs died there in the water.
korean_text: 허락하신대 더러운 귀신들이 나와서 돼지에게로 들어가매 거의 이천 마리 되는 떼가 바다를 향하여 비탈로 내리달아 바다에서 몰사하거늘

sentences.original_text: So the bad spirits came out of the man
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 악한 영들이 그 사람에게서 나왔다

sentences.original_text: and they went into the pigs
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 악한 영들은 돼지들에게 들어갔다

sentences.original_text: They rushed together down the hill
All the pigs died there in the water
